actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for a record of admission for permanent residence in the case of certain aliens who entered the United States prior to January 1, 1970, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Immigration Status Adjustment Act - Directs the Attorney General to make a record of lawful admission for permanent residence in the case of any alien under specified circumstances who entered the United States prior to January 1, 1970.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a record of admission for permanent residence in the case of certain aliens who entered the United States prior to January 1, 1970, and for other purposes.
